attributes.action: MP's to resign if they have not reached an agreement on Brexit by April 12th '19
attributes.background: Both leavers and remainers have had enough. We 65m citizens are more united than you 650 MP's. You have brought division and misery to the whole country. Much of it due to safeguarding your own position or party and not for the good of all of us. You need to do your job by April 12th or resign.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individual MPs and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
